title: Terry Carnation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/16/21
itunes:title: Terry Carnation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/16/21
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett welcomes Terry Carnation, the host of the new paranormal podcast "Dark Air" to discuss his distinguished career in late night radio, his struggles with his therapist and losing his wife, and being raised by a ghostly mother.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
